channel.title: Oliver's Personal Podcast
channel.description: I publish interesting things i like to listen to!!!
channel.itunes:author: Oliver Barreto

item.title: I NEVER Thought Cooler Master Could do This!
item.description:
The gaming peripherals market is filled with a lot of copycats but also the opinions from a lot of keyboard and mouse enthusiasts. The best gaming keyboards and the best gaming mice do something different and are designed based on community feedback. That's what Cooler Master is doing with the MM731 which could be the world's lightest wireless gaming mouse and MK721. IF they follow through, these could be some of the best peripherals for gaming and productivity.
Buy items in this video from Amazon at the links below:
Cooler Master MM720 - https://geni.us/MM720 Cooler Master MM711 - https://geni.us/MM711B NR200P Black - https://geni.us/NR200PB NR200P White - https://geni.us/NR200PW NR200 Black - https://geni.us/NR200B NR200 Whilte - https://geni.us/NR200W
Check out the NZXT BLD service - https://nzxt.co/HwcBLD
Subscribe ► https://bit.ly/SubHWC
Review unit provided free of charge by Cooler Master. This video is sponsored by NZXT. As per Hardware Canucks guidelines, no review direction was received from manufacturer. As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.
Gear list (Available on Amazon): Main Camera (Dmitry) - https://geni.us/SONYA7III Main Lens (Dmitry) - https://geni.us/Tamron2875 Main Camera (Eber) - https://geni.us/CanonEOS-R Main Lens (Eber) - https://geni.us/dLL Main 2nd Lens (Eber) - https://geni.us/Canon24-70MKII Main Camera Mic (D & E) - https://geni.us/RODEMIC Cheap 4K Camera (Panasonic G7) - https://geni.us/24nm Awesome Slider - https://geni.us/1Hwt Our Shotgun Mic - https://geni.us/Sennheiser-MKE600 ----------------------------------------­-------------------- Our full site: https://bit.ly/HardwareCanucks Join Our Forums: https://bit.ly/HWC_Forums
Follow us for more updates! Twitter https://bit.ly/HWC_Twitter FaceBook https://bit.ly/HWC_Facebook Instagram https://bit.ly/HWC_Instagram ----------------------------------------­---------------
#coolermastermm731 #coolermastermk721 #hardwarecanucks
